/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, adding depth and context to the image. Cars and buses fill the street, indicating a busy time of day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles.
